title: Mesclun and mango salad with ginger carrot dressing
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons rice vinegar', '2 tablespoons sesame oil', '1 tablespoon grated fresh root ginger', '1 tablespoon grated carrot', '1 teaspoon lime juice', '1 (250g) bag baby leaf or mixed salad', '1 mango - peeled, stone removed and diced', '2 teaspoons sesame seeds']
